alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:53PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Owyhee County through 645 PM MDT... At 552 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Hat, or 41 miles southwest of Mountain Home, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Big Horse Basin Gap around 620 PM MDT. Chalk Hills around 640 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
